scripts.dev: echo 'Run sst dev from project root'
scripts.deploy: echo 'Run sst deploy from project root'
scripts.test:daily: pnpm with-env npx sst shell --stage dev -- node -e "import('./src/functions/cron/daily.js').then(m => m.main())"
scripts.test:weekly: pnpm with-env npx sst shell --stage dev -- node -e "import('./src/functions/cron/weekly.js').then(m => m.main())"
